en.title: Data Entry & Administration Services
en.description: Below are some services I have worked on for clients from various sectors. Client data and document details are kept confidential, but you can see the range of solutions I offer.

categories.title: Data Entry & General Administration
items: Typing trip schedule format (Word & PDF, ready to print)
Typing company visit schedule format (Word, Excel, PDF)

categories.title: Government Document Writing Assistance
items: Data research from PDF and PowerPoint documents
Analysis based on field data and previous research
Risk management preparation using SWOT approach

categories.title: Academic Assistance
items: Thesis Revision - Management & FEB Faculty (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, PDF, SPSS screenshots)
Thesis Writing - Faculty of Communication Science (FIKOM) (Word, Excel, video transcripts, minutes, PowerPoint, PDF)
Thesis & Journal - Engineering Faculty (Word, Excel, PDF, PowerPoint, web & desktop applications: XAMPP & SQL Server)
Thesis Formatting - Public Management Faculty (Word & PDF)

categories.title: Healthcare Institution Services
items: Medical staff data compilation (doctors & nurses) in Excel & PDF format

categories.title: Educational Writing Services
items: Creating elementary to high school papers according to curriculum (Word & PDF)

categories.title: Social & Religious Administration
items: Mosque administration data format for Eid al-Adha & Eid al-Fitr (Word & PDF)

categories.title: Proposal & Legal Documents
items: Price quotation letters (borehole projects & bus stop construction)
Re-typing ownership asset drafts for administrative purposes

categories.title: Events & Performance
items: Seminar minutes, ready to print & distribute (Word & PDF)
Lecturer performance reports: data collection, summary preparation, format arrangement (Word, Google Docs, Spreadsheet)

cta.text: Want to consult or need similar services?

id.title: Daftar Layanan Data Entry & Administrasi
id.description: Berikut adalah beberapa layanan yang telah saya kerjakan untuk klien dari berbagai sektor. Detail data dan dokumen klien dijaga kerahasiaannya, namun Anda dapat melihat ragam solusi yang saya tawarkan.

categories.title: Data Entry & Administrasi Umum
items: Pengetikan format jadwal trip (Word & PDF, siap cetak)
Pengetikan format jadwal kunjungan perusahaan (Word, Excel, PDF)

categories.title: Asistensi Penulisan Naskah Dinas – Instansi Pemerintah
items: Riset data dari dokumen PDF dan PowerPoint
Analisis berdasarkan data lapangan dan riset sebelumnya
Penyusunan manajemen risiko dengan pendekatan SWOT

categories.title: Asistensi Akademik
items: Revisi Skripsi – Fakultas Manajemen & FEB (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, PDF, screenshot SPSS)
Penulisan Skripsi – Fakultas Ilmu Komunikasi (FIKOM) (Word, Excel, transkrip video, notulen, PowerPoint, PDF)
Skripsi & Jurnal – Fakultas Teknik (Word, Excel, PDF, PowerPoint, aplikasi berbasis website & desktop: XAMPP & SQL Server)
Perapihan Tesis – Fakultas Manajemen Pemerintahan (Word & PDF)

categories.title: Layanan untuk Instansi Kesehatan
items: Rekap data tenaga medis (dokter & perawat) dalam format Excel & PDF

categories.title: Layanan Penulisan Pendidikan
items: Pembuatan makalah tingkat SD hingga SMA sesuai kurikulum (Word & PDF)

categories.title: Administrasi Sosial & Kegiatan Keagamaan
items: Format pendataan administrasi masjid untuk Idul Adha & Idul Fitri (Word & PDF)

categories.title: Dokumen Penawaran & Legalitas
items: Surat penawaran harga (proyek sumur bor & pembuatan halte)
Pengetikan ulang draft aset kepemilikan untuk keperluan administrasi

categories.title: Acara & Kinerja
items: Surat acara seminar, siap cetak & distribusi (Word & PDF)
Laporan kinerja dosen: pengumpulan data, penyusunan ringkasan, perapihan format (Word, Google Docs, Spreadsheet)

cta.text: Ingin konsultasi atau butuh layanan serupa?
